description: Lists the history of previous optimizer runs for a specific table.

parameters.name: CatalogId
parameters.description: The Catalog ID of the table.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database in the catalog in which the table resides.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The Catalog ID of the table.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the database in the catalog in which the table resides.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The name of the table.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token for paginating the returned list of optimizer runs, returned if the current segment of the list is not the last.

nested_items.name: TableOptimizerRuns
nested_items.description: A list of the optimizer runs associated with a table.

nested_items.name: eventType
nested_items.description: An event type representing the status of the table optimizer run.

nested_items.name: startTimestamp
nested_items.description: Represents the epoch timestamp at which the compaction job was started within Lake Formation.

nested_items.name: endTimestamp
nested_items.description: Represents the epoch timestamp at which the compaction job ended.

nested_items.name: NumberOfBytesCompacted
nested_items.description: The number of bytes removed by the compaction job run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfFilesCompacted
nested_items.description: The number of files removed by the compaction job run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfDpus
nested_items.description: The number of DPUs consumed by the job, rounded up to the nearest whole number.

nested_items.name: JobDurationInHour
nested_items.description: The duration of the job in hours.

nested_items.name: error
nested_items.description: An error that occured during the optimizer run.

nested_items.name: compactionMetrics
nested_items.description: A CompactionMetrics object containing metrics for the optimizer run.

nested_items.name: IcebergMetrics
nested_items.description: A structure containing the Iceberg compaction metrics for the optimizer run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfBytesCompacted
nested_items.description: The number of bytes removed by the compaction job run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfFilesCompacted
nested_items.description: The number of files removed by the compaction job run.

nested_items.name: DpuHours
nested_items.description: The number of DPU hours consumed by the job.

nested_items.name: NumberOfDpus
nested_items.description: The number of DPUs consumed by the job, rounded up to the nearest whole number.

nested_items.name: JobDurationInHour
nested_items.description: The duration of the job in hours.

nested_items.name: retentionMetrics
nested_items.description: A RetentionMetrics object containing metrics for the optimizer run.

nested_items.name: IcebergMetrics
nested_items.description: A structure containing the Iceberg retention metrics for the optimizer run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfDataFilesDeleted
nested_items.description: The number of data files deleted by the retention job run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfManifestFilesDeleted
nested_items.description: The number of manifest files deleted by the retention job run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfManifestListsDeleted
nested_items.description: The number of manifest lists deleted by the retention job run.

nested_items.name: DpuHours
nested_items.description: The number of DPU hours consumed by the job.

nested_items.name: NumberOfDpus
nested_items.description: The number of DPUs consumed by the job, rounded up to the nearest whole number.

nested_items.name: JobDurationInHour
nested_items.description: The duration of the job in hours.

nested_items.name: orphanFileDeletionMetrics
nested_items.description: An OrphanFileDeletionMetrics object containing metrics for the optimizer run.

nested_items.name: IcebergMetrics
nested_items.description: A structure containing the Iceberg orphan file deletion metrics for the optimizer run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfOrphanFilesDeleted
nested_items.description: The number of orphan files deleted by the orphan file deletion job run.

nested_items.name: DpuHours
nested_items.description: The number of DPU hours consumed by the job.

nested_items.name: NumberOfDpus
nested_items.description: The number of DPUs consumed by the job, rounded up to the nearest whole number.

nested_items.name: JobDurationInHour
nested_items.description: The duration of the job in hours.
